name: Five Nights At Playtime 3
description:
The other 2 are on scratch. They wouldn't work. I doubt this one would. But it's worth to try. 

Part 3 for the Five Nights At Playtime's Franchise. There will be either 6 or 8 parts of this game. 

It's Kinda glitchy but I update it soon.

Mouse and clicking.
